BattleCruiser.Name: Battle Cruiser
BattleCruiser.Description: This ship is the firepower of the fleet. It will do tons of damage but will not be able to keep up with it's enemies due to it's low speed.

TorpedoShip.Name: Torpedo Ship
TorpedoShip.Description: This ship is the most balanced in the fleet. It has a good amount of health with decent damage. It's damage might be somewhat low but it shoots torpedos which are hard to dodge!
